page.title: 21A day in the life
page.content:
On Saturday I had my football presentation and I got a little trophy. I got some chips, I also won the raffle for my mum. She had two tickets for the comedy club but I can’t go because there were for adults. I don’t know who she is taking, but probably her friend or her boyfriend.

After the raffle there was a disco and some auction prizes. We bid for a Charlton top because my dad likes Charlton but we didn’t win. We bid £70 pounds the winner buddied £120. I felt happy that I got a trophy, my manager got the manager of the year award I was really pleased he got this.
Pupil Montbelle
